description:
Dororo`s very concerned about global warming, and tries to educate Keroro to be less wasteful to help avert it.  Keroro is not interested in interrupting his conveniences, though.  Then the platoon goes to Egypt to look for an ancient Keronian treasure.  Instead, they wind up waking up Sababa, demon lord of the desert!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, What is Global Warming? / Sababa, Devil King of The Desert
ケロロ 地球温暖化ってなぁに? / サババ 砂漠の魔王
